7425  return ER_CSS_KILL_UNKNOWN_TRANSACTION;
7426  }
7427 
7428  if (strcasecmp (tran_client_name, current_client_name) == 0)
7429  {
7430  *has_authorization = true;
7431  }
7432 
7433  return NO_ERROR;
7434 }
7435 
7436 /*
7437  * xlogtb_kill_tran_index() - Kill given transaction.
7438  * return:
7439  * kill_tran_index(in):
7440  * kill_user(in):
7441  * kill_host(in):
7442  * kill_pid(id):
7443  */
7444 int
7445 xlogtb_kill_tran_index (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int kill_tran_index, char *kill_user_p, char *kill_host_p,
7446  int kill_pid)
7447 {
7448  char *slam_progname_p; /* Client program name for tran */
7449  char *slam_user_p; /* Client user name for tran */
7450  char *slam_host_p; /* Client host for tran */
7451  int slam_pid; /* Client process id for tran */
7452  bool signaled = false;
7453  int error_code = NO_ERROR;
7454  bool killed = false;
7455  size_t i;
7456 
7457  if (kill_tran_index == NULL_TRAN_INDEX || kill_user_p == NULL || kill_host_p == NULL || strcmp (kill_user_p, "") == 0
7458  || strcmp (kill_host_p, "") == 0)
7459  {
7460  /*
7461  * Not enough information to kill specific transaction..
7462  *
7463  * For now.. I am setting an er_set..since I have so many files out..and
7464  * I cannot compile more junk..
7465  */
7466  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_CSS_KILL_BAD_INTERFACE, 0);
7467  return ER_CSS_KILL_BAD_INTERFACE;
7468  }
7469 
7470  if (kill_tran_index == LOG_SYSTEM_TRAN_INDEX)
7471  {
7472  // cannot kill system transaction; not even if this is dba
7473  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_KILL_TR_NOT_ALLOWED, 1, kill_tran_index);
7474  return ER_KILL_TR_NOT_ALLOWED;
7475  }
7476 
7477  signaled = false;
7478  for (i = 0; i < LOGTB_RETRY_SLAM_MAX_TIMES && error_code == NO_ERROR && !killed; i++)
7479  {
7480  if (logtb_find_client_name_host_pid (kill_tran_index, &slam_progname_p, &slam_user_p, &slam_host_p, &slam_pid) !=
7481  NO_ERROR)
7482  {
7483  if (signaled == false)
7484  {
7485  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_CSS_KILL_UNKNOWN_TRANSACTION, 4, kill_tran_index,
7486  kill_user_p, kill_host_p, kill_pid);
7487  error_code = ER_CSS_KILL_UNKNOWN_TRANSACTION;
7488  }
7489  else
7490  {
7491  killed = true;
7492  }
7493  break;
7494  }
7495 
7496  if (kill_pid == slam_pid && strcmp (kill_user_p, slam_user_p) == 0 && strcmp (kill_host_p, slam_host_p) == 0)
7497  {
7498  logtb_slam_transaction (thread_p, kill_tran_index);
7499  signaled = true;
7500  }
7501  else
7502  {
7503  if (signaled == false)
7504  {
7505  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_CSS_KILL_DOES_NOTMATCH, 8, kill_tran_index, kill_user_p,
7506  kill_host_p, kill_pid, kill_tran_index, slam_user_p, slam_host_p, slam_pid);
7507  error_code = ER_CSS_KILL_DOES_NOTMATCH;
7508  }
7509  else
7510  {
7511  killed = true;
7512  }
7513  break;
7514  }
7515  thread_sleep_for (std::chrono::seconds (1));
7516  }
7517 
7518  if (error_code == NO_ERROR && !killed)
7519  {
7520  error_code = ER_FAILED; /* timeout */
7521  }
7522 
7523  return error_code;
7524 }
7525 
7526 /*
7527  * xlogtb_kill_or_interrupt_tran() -
7528  * return:
7529  * thread_p(in):
7530  * tran_index(in):
7531  * is_dba_group_member(in):
7532  * kill_query_only(in):
7533  */
7534 int
7535 xlogtb_kill_or_interrupt_tran (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int tran_index, bool is_dba_group_member, bool interrupt_only)
7536 {
7537  int error;
7538  bool interrupt, has_authorization;
7539  bool is_trx_exists;
7540  KILLSTMT_TYPE kill_type;
7541  size_t i;
7542 
7543  if (tran_index == LOG_SYSTEM_TRAN_INDEX)
7544  {
7545  // cannot kill system transaction; not even if this is dba
7546  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_KILL_TR_NOT_ALLOWED, 1, tran_index);
7547  return ER_KILL_TR_NOT_ALLOWED;
7548  }
7549 
7550  if (!is_dba_group_member)
7551  {
7552  error = logtb_check_kill_tran_auth (thread_p, tran_index, &has_authorization);
7553  if (error != NO_ERROR)
7554  {
7555  return error;
7556  }
7557 
7558  if (has_authorization == false)
7559  {
7560  er_set (ER_ERROR_SEVERITY, ARG_FILE_LINE, ER_KILL_TR_NOT_ALLOWED, 1, tran_index);
7561  return ER_KILL_TR_NOT_ALLOWED;
7562  }
7563  }
7564 
7565  is_trx_exists = logtb_set_tran_index_interrupt (thread_p, tran_index, true);
7566 
7567  kill_type = interrupt_only ? KILLSTMT_QUERY : KILLSTMT_TRAN;
7568  if (kill_type == KILLSTMT_TRAN)
7569  {
7570 #if defined (SERVER_MODE)
7571  css_shutdown_conn_by_tran_index (tran_index);
7572 #endif // SERVER_MODE
7573  }
7574 
7575  for (i = 0; i < LOGTB_RETRY_SLAM_MAX_TIMES; i++)
7576  {
7577  thread_sleep_for (std::chrono::seconds (1));
7578 
7579  if (logtb_find_interrupt (tran_index, &interrupt) != NO_ERROR)
7580  {
7581  break;
7582  }
7583  if (interrupt == false)
7584  {
7585  break;
7586  }
7587  }
7588 
7589  if (i == LOGTB_RETRY_SLAM_MAX_TIMES)
7590  {
7591  return ER_FAILED; /* timeout */
7592  }
7593 
7594  if (is_trx_exists == false)
7595  {
7596  /*
7597  * Note that the following error will be ignored by
7598  * sthread_kill_or_interrupt_tran().
7599  */
7600  return ER_FAILED;
7601  }
7602 
7603  return NO_ERROR;
7604 }
7605 
7606 //
7607 // logtb_find_thread_entry_mapfunc - function mapped over thread manager's entries to find thread belonging to given
7608 // transaction index
7609 //
7610 // thread_ref (in) : thread entry
7611 // stop_mapper (out) : output true to stop mapping
7612 // tran_index (in) : searched transaction index
7613 // except_me (in) : true to accept current transaction, false otherwise
7614 // found_ptr (out) : saves pointer to found thread entry
7615 //
7616 static void
7617 logtb_find_thread_entry_mapfunc (THREAD_ENTRY & thread_ref, bool & stop_mapper, int tran_index, bool except_me,
7618  REFPTR (THREAD_ENTRY, found_ptr))
7619 {
7620  if (thread_ref.tran_index != tran_index)
7621  {
7622  // not this
7623  return;
7624  }
7625  if (except_me && thread_ref.is_on_current_thread ())
7626  {
7627  // not me
7628  return;
7629  }
7630  // found
7631  found_ptr = &thread_ref;
7632  stop_mapper = true; // stop searching
7633 }
7634 
7635 //
7636 // logtb_find_thread_by_tran_index - find thread entry by transaction index
7637 //
7638 // return : NULL or pointer to found thread
7639 // tran_index (in) : searched transaction index
7640 //
7641 THREAD_ENTRY *
7642 logtb_find_thread_by_tran_index (int tran_index)
7643 {
7644  THREAD_ENTRY *found_thread = NULL;
7645  thread_get_manager ()->map_entries (logtb_find_thread_entry_mapfunc, tran_index, false, found_thread);
7646  return found_thread;
7647 }
7648 
7649 //
7650 // thread_find_entry_by_tran_index_except_me - find thread entry by transaction index; ignore current thread
7651 //
7652 // return : NULL or pointer to found thread
7653 // tran_index (in) : searched transaction index
7654 //
7655 THREAD_ENTRY *
7656 logtb_find_thread_by_tran_index_except_me (int tran_index)
7657 {
7658  THREAD_ENTRY *found_thread = NULL;
7659  thread_get_manager ()->map_entries (logtb_find_thread_entry_mapfunc, tran_index, true, found_thread);
7660  return found_thread;
7661 }
7662 
7663 #if defined (SERVER_MODE)
7664 //
7665 // logtb_wakeup_thread_with_tran_index - find thread by transaction index and wake it
7666 //
7667 // tran_index (in) : searched transaction index
7668 // resume_reason (in) : the reason thread is resumed
7669 void
7670 logtb_wakeup_thread_with_tran_index (int tran_index, thread_resume_suspend_status resume_reason)
7671 {
7672  // find thread with transaction index; ignore current thread
7673  THREAD_ENTRY *thread_p = logtb_find_thread_by_tran_index_except_me (tran_index);
7674  if (thread_p == NULL)
7675  {
7676  // not found
7677  return;
7678  }
7679 
7680  thread_wakeup (thread_p, resume_reason);
7681 }
7682 #endif // SERVER_MODE
7683 
7684 /*
7685  * logtb_get_current_tran_index() - get transaction index of current thread
7686  * return:
7687  */
7688 int
7689 logtb_get_current_tran_index (void)
7690 {
7691  THREAD_ENTRY *thread_p = thread_get_thread_entry_info ();
7692  assert (thread_p != NULL);
7693 
7694  return thread_p->tran_index;
7695 }
7696 
7697 /*
7698  * logtb_set_current_tran_index - set transaction index on current thread
7699  */
7700 void
7701 logtb_set_current_tran_index (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, int tran_index)
7702 {
7703  if (thread_p == NULL)
7704  {
7705  thread_p = thread_get_thread_entry_info ();
7706  }
7707  thread_p->tran_index = tran_index;
7708 }
7709 
7710 /*
7711  * logtb_set_check_interrupt() -
7712  * return:
7713  * flag(in):
7714  */
7715 bool
7716 logtb_set_check_interrupt (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p, bool flag)
7717 {
7718 #if defined (SERVER_MODE)
7719  bool old_val = true;
7720 
7721  if (BO_IS_SERVER_RESTARTED ())
7722  {
7723  if (thread_p == NULL)
7724  {
7725  thread_p = thread_get_thread_entry_info ();
7726  }
7727 
7728  /* safe guard: vacuum workers should not check for interrupt */
7729  assert (flag == false || !VACUUM_IS_THREAD_VACUUM (thread_p));
7730  old_val = thread_p->check_interrupt;
7731  thread_p->check_interrupt = flag;
7732  }
7733 
7734  return old_val;
7735 #else // not SERVER_MODE = SA_MODE
7736  return tran_set_check_interrupt (flag);
7737 #endif // not SERVER_MODE = SA_MODE
7738 }
7739 
7740 /*
7741  * logtb_get_check_interrupt() -
7742  * return:
7743  */
7744 bool
7745 logtb_get_check_interrupt (THREAD_ENTRY * thread_p)
7746 {
7747 #if defined (SERVER_MODE)
7748  bool ret_val = true;
7749 
7750  if (BO_IS_SERVER_RESTARTED ())
7751  {
7752  if (thread_p == NULL)
7753  {
7754  thread_p = thread_get_thread_entry_info ();
7755  }
7756 
7757  ret_val = thread_p->check_interrupt;
7758  }
7759 
7760  return ret_val;
7761 #else // not SERVER_MODE = SA_MODE
7762  return tran_get_check_interrupt ();
7763 #endif // not SERVER_MODE = SA_MODE
7764 }
